mean_cn: adj.仓促的，贸然的，轻率的；  v.【气象】凝结；促成，使……沉淀，猛摔；  n.沉淀物，冷凝物
mean_en: to suddenly force somebody/something into a particular state or condition
sentence: The precipitate opening of the car door caused a collision with the cyclist.
sentence_trans: 车门突然打开，撞上了骑行者。
word_etyma: pre…前的，预先 + cipit头 + ate做，造成 → precipitate加速，促进
